data.name: SAPAT06
data.description:
App: SAP, Info: SAP WebDispatcher fuer Buyerlaunchpad 
If it's a quick maintenance, for avoid users from Buyerlaunchpad are impacted I think between 12h-14h  or after 17h it's OK.    
=> If you stop system, we have to stop SLT for Bremen in order avoid dump an error connexion message on system SLT. 
it's more clean, but not mandatory . when you start again your system, the links  is established again automatically.  
 
When we active replication on table,  SAP SLT creates tables/function for store trigger in your system backend connected at every time there is a adding/change on table record. 
A job in SAP SLT (SAP DR2/RR2 or PR2) check trigger tables every 5 minutes in your system and if new trigger to work, replicate the data corresponding in HANA database. 
 
Problem when copy prod on qualify /dev 
- Please alert us mandatory in this case 
- More problem when you do a copy on Qualif or dev system, because all objects generated by SLT in your backend (trigger / etc..) are erased and not align with SLT nomination. 
- Action we have to apply after copy on system => we have to  delete all data in HANA / delete all replication in SLT and start all replication to regenerate all objects. 
 
 
SAP Dispatcher: Auswirkungen auf Fiori SAP-HR und SBP 
 
, IT-Level: Level 3, Werk: 1;#ArcelorMittal Bremen GmbH, Abteilung: TI-TIC, , ASP: Breier, Stephan;#1866
